error.message: Call to deprecated method assertEqual() of class Drupal\KernelTests\KernelTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->assertEquals() instead.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ~9.0 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
